statements: SELECT lobbyist_name, interaction_type FROM lobbyists;
SELECT lobbyist_name, interaction_date FROM lobbyists WHERE lobbyist_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lobbyists WHERE lobbyist_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT lobbyist_name, interaction_type FROM lobbyists WHERE lawmaker_id = 3;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM lobbyists WHERE lobbyist_name = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT lobbyist_id, lobbyist_name, interaction_date, interaction_type, lawmaker_id FROM lobbyists ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT lobbyist_name, interaction_type FROM lobbyists WHERE lawmaker_id = 12345;
SELECT lobbyist_name, COUNT(interaction_type) AS interaction_count FROM lobbyists GROUP BY lobbyist_name;
SELECT DISTINCT lobbyist_id FROM lobbyists WHERE lobbyist_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM lobbyists WHERE lobbyist_name LIKE '%corruption%' ORDER BY lobbyist_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM lobbyists;
SELECT id, name, organization FROM lobbyists WHERE organization = 'ABC Company';
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, lawmaker_id, description FROM interactions WHERE lobbyist_id = 1;
SELECT name, organization, contact_info FROM lobbyists ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, organization, contact_info FROM lobbyists WHERE organization='Tech Lobby' ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE lawmaker_id=10 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name FROM lobbyists WHERE organization='Healthcare Lobby' AND name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE description LIKE '%meeting%' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM lobbyists WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM lobbyists;
SELECT name, organization FROM lobbyists WHERE organization = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT * FROM lawmakers ORDER BY party DESC;
SELECT name, party FROM lawmakers WHERE party = 'Republican' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT lobbyist_id, lawmaker_id, date FROM interactions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, organization FROM lobbyists WHERE lobbyist_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM lawmakers WHERE party = 'Democratic' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT lobbyist_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY lobbyist_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM lawmakers WHERE party = 'Republican' AND name LIKE '%son%';

SELECT interactions.date, interactions.description, lobbyists.name AS lobbyist_name, lawmakers.name AS lawmaker_name FROM interactions JOIN lobbyists ON interactions.lobbyist_id = lobbyists.lobbyist_id JOIN lawmakers ON interactions.lawmaker_id = lawmakers.lawmaker_id ORDER BY interactions.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM lobbyists;
SELECT name, contact_info FROM lobbyists ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT lawmaker_id, name, party FROM lawmakers WHERE party = 'Republican';
SELECT bill_id, title FROM bills WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT lobbyist_id, lawmaker_id, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM lawmakers WHERE party = 'Republican' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT lobbyist_id, name, contact_info FROM lobbyists WHERE lobbyist_id IN (SELECT lobbyist_id FROM interactions WHERE lawmaker_id = 1);

SELECT name, title FROM lawmakers JOIN interactions ON lawmakers.lawmaker_id = interactions.lawmaker_id JOIN bills ON interactions.bill_id = bills.bill_id WHERE interactions.interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT * FROM lobbyists INNER JOIN interactions ON lobbyists.lobbyist_id = interactions.lobbyist_id INNER JOIN lawmakers ON interactions.lawmaker_id = lawmakers.lawmaker_id WHERE lobbyists.contact_info LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT DISTINCT lobbyists.name AS lobbyist_name, lawmakers.name AS lawmaker_name FROM lobbyists, lawmakers, interactions WHERE lobbyists.lobbyist_id = interactions.lobbyist_id AND lawmakers.lawmaker_id = interactions.lawmaker_id ORDER BY lobbyist_name DESC, lawmaker_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM lobbyists LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, organization FROM lobbyists WHERE organization = 'Tech Inc';
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT name AS lawmaker_name, party AS political_party FROM lawmakers WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT organization, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM lobbyists GROUP BY organization;
SELECT * FROM lobbyists WHERE organization = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT id, name, organization FROM lobbyists WHERE id < 10 ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT interactions.meeting_date, lobbyists.name as lobbyist_name, lawmakers.name as lawmaker_name FROM interactions JOIN lobbyists ON interactions.lobbyist_id = lobbyists.id JOIN lawmakers ON interactions.lawmaker_id = lawmakers.id WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT meetings.location, meetings.notes, lobbyists.name as lobbyist_name, lawmakers.name as lawmaker_name FROM meetings JOIN lobbyists ON meetings.lobbyist_id = lobbyists.id JOIN lawmakers ON meetings.lawmaker_id = lawmakers.id WHERE meetings.notes IS NOT NULL;

SELECT organizations.name as org_name, COUNT(*) as num_interactions FROM interactions JOIN lobbyists ON interactions.lobbyist_id = lobbyists.id JOIN organizations ON lobbyists.organization = organizations.name GROUP BY organizations.name ORDER BY num_interactions DESC LIMIT 5;
